content: when the west coast of canada enters scorpio it gets cold fast the damp chill air of the island makes one glad to have a fire stove tea and warm cozy leg warmers on hand to add extra warmth and layers scorpio leg warmers were inspired by a desire to have a thick and soft leg warmer that i could wear in the darker months of the year both around the house and while wandering the winter ocean shore it s a sister design to my earth mama leg warmers pattern offering a bit more weight the body ribbing helps the leg warmer hug your leg while the larger gauge ribbing at the bottom allows it to drape over your boot easily it s a very quick knit making it ideal for gift knitting sizing s m l to fit 30 35 cm 35-40 cm 40- 45cm or 12 14 14 16 16 18 calf circumference all sizes are approximately 39 5 cm / 15 5 in total length after blocking and is easily customizable be sure to follow me on my website 1 facebook 2 or instagram 3 for upcoming promotions patterns and other fun things photo credit ron pogue photography errata please note a new version of the pattern was uploaded on jan 26 2017 if you have an older version of this pattern please download the updated version thank you 1 www wolfandfaun com 2 http //www facebook com/wolfandfaunknits 3 http //www instagram com/wolfandfaunknits
